long_description: Five Star Natural Turkey Jerky is a great snack for people on the go. Needs no refrigeration so it can easily be taken on long trips. No preparation necessary; eat them right out of the package. Resealable bag makes keeping jerky fresh on the trail easy. Made from all-natural turkey breast; no artificial ingredients. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Five Star Natural Turkey Jerky is a great snack for people on the go.
